skills.name: Lightning Rush
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Shackle Breaker
skills.desc: Consumes Arlan's HP equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of his Max HP to deal Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy. If Arlan does not have sufficient HP, his HP will be reduced to 1 after using his Skill.

skills.name: Frenzied Punishment
skills.desc: Deals Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Arlan's ATK to a single enemy and Lightning DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak></color> of Arlan's ATK to enemies adjacent to it.

skills.name: Pain and Anger
skills.desc: Increases Arlan's DMG for every percent of HP below his Max HP, up to a max of <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> more DMG.

skills.name: Swift Harvest
skills.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. After entering battle, deals Lightning DMG equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of Arlan's ATK to all enemies.

eidolons.name: To the Bitter End
eidolons.desc: When HP is lower than or equal to <unbreak>50%</unbreak> of Max HP, increases Skill's DMG by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Breaking Free
eidolons.desc: Using Skill or Ultimate removes 1 debuff from oneself.

eidolons.name: Power Through
eidolons.desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Turn the Tables
eidolons.desc: When struck by a killing blow after entering battle, instead of becoming knocked down, Arlan immediately restores his HP to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of his Max HP. This effect is automatically removed after it is triggered once or after <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s) have elapsed.

eidolons.name: Hammer and Tongs
eidolons.desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Self-Sacrifice
eidolons.desc: When HP drops to <unbreak>50%</unbreak> or below, Ultimate deals <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> more DMG. The DMG multiplier of DMG taken by the target enemy now applies to adjacent enemies as well.

skillTree.name: Revival
skillTree.desc: If the current HP percentage is <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> or lower when defeating an enemy, immediately restores HP equal to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of Max HP.

skillTree.name: Endurance
skillTree.desc: The chance to resist DoT Debuffs increases by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>.

skillTree.name: Repel
skillTree.desc: Upon entering battle, if Arlan's HP is less than or equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak>, he can nullify all DMG received except for DoT until after he is attacked.
